resources.string: Ask a yes or no question

1. The AI generates a mystery story for you to solve. Read the story carefully and take note of any clues or details that might be important.

 2. Once you have read the story, ask the AI a question about it. The AI will only answer yesor noto your questions. Use your questions to gather information and narrow down the possibilities for the solution.

 3. If you think you know the solution to the mystery, click the Solutionbutton and enter your guess. The AI will then tell you whether your guess is correct or not.
